TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public interface auto ansi abstract MediaPlayer/IOnBufferingUpdateListener implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: Interface definition of a callback to be invoked indicating buffering status of a media resource being streamed over the network.

remarks.para: Interface definition of a callback to be invoked indicating buffering status of a media resource being streamed over the network.

MemberSignature.Value: public void OnBufferingUpdate (Android.Media.MediaPlayer mp, int percent);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnBufferingUpdate(class Android.Media.MediaPlayer mp, int32 percent) cil managed

Docs.param: the MediaPlayer the update pertains to
the percentage (0-100) of the content that has been buffered or played thus far
Docs.summary: Called to update status in buffering a media stream received through progressive HTTP download.

remarks.para: Called to update status in buffering a media stream received through progressive HTTP download. The received buffering percentage indicates how much of the content has been buffered or played. For example a buffering update of 80 percent when half the content has already been played indicates that the next 30 percent of the content to play has been buffered.
